original_text: He shall put on the holy linen coat and shall have the linen undergarment on his body, and he shall tie the linen sash around his waist, and wear the linen turban; these are the holy garments. He shall bathe his body in water and then put them on.
korean_text: 거룩한 세마포 속옷을 입으며 세마포 속바지를 몸에 입고 세마포 띠를 띠며 세마포 관을 쓸지니 이것들은 거룩한 옷이라 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: He shall put on the holy linen coat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 세마포 겉옷을 입어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and shall have the linen undergarment on his body
and he shall tie the linen sash around his waist
He shall bathe his body in water
